title: A new algorithm for optimal 2-constraint satisfaction and its implications

tldr.text: A novel method for exactly solving general constraint satisfaction optimization with at most two variables per constraint with the first exponential improvement over the trivial algorithm, which yields connections between the complexity of some (polynomial time) high-dimensional search problems and some NP-hard problems.
